articles.title: 58-foot asteroid nearing Earth at a staggering speed of 50940 kmph - HT Tech

articles.content: Do you know that every day, our planet is bombarded with more than 100 tons of dust and sand sized particles. While, about once a year an automobile-sized asteroid hits Earth's atmosphere, creates an… [+1400 chars]

articles.title: Jurassic Makeover: Revealing the True Faces of Predatory Dinosaurs Like T. rex - SciTechDaily
